folder.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a container for keeping loose papers in, made of folded card or plastic
folder.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a group of related documents that you store together on a computer
folder.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a cover for keeping loose papers in, made of card or plastic
folder.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: All the correspondence is in this folder.
folder.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a place in a computer where a group of related FILEs are stored, usually appearing on the screen as a picture of a folder
folder.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Most programs automatically create a document folder on the desktop.
